snippet.title: RPG Illusion of L'Phalcia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience epic 3D battles and go on a mission to find the legendary Sword of Amal!
RPG presented at E3 2014, Illusion of L'Phalcia is now available for Android/iOS!

Get it now on:
App Store
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id847331685?mt=8

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.lphalcia&hl=en

The Sword of Amal is said to grant any wish so long as it is provided magic power.
Ryser believes in the sword's existence and is in the middle of searching for all the map pieces that lead to the sword when he runs into Tiana, a mysterious girl being chased by soldiers. What awaits these young heroes as they set off to look for the sword together?

©2014 KEMCO/EXE-CREATE
※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
